Knowing that the Decepticons wouldn't settle for talking the problems out I=
ce transformed to her owl form and flew above the city. "The shields didn't=
 recognize mutant signatures last time I was in the nrighborhood." she thou=
ght deciding it would be best not to try entering while the battle was goin=
g on. The Decepticons were a bit bigger than she was and she wasn't one to =
try to go hand to hand if she didn't know the outcome. If Lunarpine had tau=
ght her one thing it was that she was no fighter. If she was to get through=
 this it wato be by intelligence, not force. "Maximals, we're getting nowhe=
re fighting individual battles. move together and I can direct you."  knowi=
ng also about the dease fire between the black fortress Predacons and the M=
aximals she could use a little psychology. "Perceptor, you are seriously pu=
shing the agreement that was aranged a while back, turn and leave and maybe=
 you'll save the faith." Logic had always been her strong suit over brute f=
orce now her Maximal back ground was needed over her mutant powers. "Maxima=
ls inside the city, as the senior Maximal here I'm assuming command, check =
the records under SHADOW WING if you please to back up my claims."

Mustex =
moved forward "I'm with you Ice." he rose his rifle and fired five more pul=
se blasts from his rifle, this time targeting the target master Triggerhapp=
y
